original_body_lines: Blackheads are embedded on your face pores and are filled with dead cells and sebum. They are mood spoilers for every girl and are hard to get rid of, too. But orange is a saviour for all the girls out there who are struggling to get rid of the blackheads. Prepare a mask by mixing one-part yoghurt with orange peel powder and make a thick paste. Apply this on your face, using circular motions, and then wash it off with warm water, after 15 minutes. This is the best natural and effective method to remove blackheads, in a pain-free way.

It goes without saying that one needs to clean, tone and moisturise your skin on a regular basis. With that in mind, one should try out the homemade toners. With abundant amounts of Vitamin C and antioxidants, orange peels maintain the oils of the skin. The best part is that they are suitable for oily, as well as dry skin. With the application of orange peels on skin, it removes the dead skin cells and keeps it toned. For the face mask, take one grated orange peel and one cup yoghurt to make a scrub. Apply it on your face and wash it after 10 minutes.

One of the most effective ways to stimulate hair growth is by consuming oranges. Oranges contain Vitamin C along with bio-flavonoids which aids in proper circulation to the scalp, and, in turn, promoting hair growth. Therefore, consumption of oranges is a great way to boosting the intake of desired nutrients, hence stimulating hair growth.
